name: Gatsby Starter EasyDITA
description: A Gatsby starting point for the EasyDITA portal framework

PORTAL_CONTENT_RUNTIME_REMOTE.description: Whether or not to enable runtime remote mode

PORTAL_CONTENT_BUILDTIME_REMOTE.description: Whether or not to enable buildtime remote mode

PORTAL_CONTENT_BUILDTIME_STATIC.description: Whether or not to enable buildtime static mode
